title: Build a Parking Garage, then Develop Worth Lot
description: Until a new parking garage is built to address Portsmouth's parking shortfall, the best use of the Worth Lot is public parking.

title: Doble Senior Activities Center
description: The City Council should consider repurposing the Paul A. Doble Army Reserve Center on Cottage Street as a senior activities center.

title: Running for City Council
description: I have always believed in civic duty and public service; first as an Eagle Scout, then as a U.S. Army officer, and now as a candidate.

title: Iraq veteran Denton announces run for City Council
description: Early entrant jumps in on senior center, parking.

title: Attend Form-Based Zoning Charettes
description: Form-based zoning will ensure that the placement, scale, and architectural design of new developments stay true to Portsmouth's character.

title: Holistic Approach includes a Parking Garage
description: A holistic approach to transportation with a parking garage on the outskirts of downtown would benefit residents, businesses, and visitors.

title: Listen to Portsmouth Listens
description: I encourage the City Council to study, implement, and take credit for any of the viable transportation plans from Portsmouth Listens.

title: Deer Street Garage is a Viable Worth Lot Alternative
description: I encourage other privately owned locations be considered for a more ideal second parking garage, like Gary's Beverages.

title: New Developments Should Inspire
description: Form-based zoning will ensure new development's placement, scale, and architectural design preserve Portsmouth’s character and continue to inspire.

title: Will Work for Your Vote
description: I will knock on doors every weekend between Labor Day and Election Day to learn what matters most to you.

title: Denton crew canvasses throughout city
description: Council hopeful and his friends spread message.

title: Reform the Taxi Commission
description: Everyone would benefit if our patrons knew they could expect a row of taxis lined up waiting for them when they leave our establishments.

title: Excited About Large Candidate Field
description: I look forward to a positive campaign season and earning your votes alongside my fellow candidates on the campaign trail.

title: Denton focuses on parking, senior center, zoning
description: Council candidate cites passion for public service

title: Implement and Expand Form-Based Zoning
description: Implement form-based zoning downtown, and then expand it through the remainder of the Historic District, the Northern Tier, and the Islington Corridor.

title: Josh Denton, Stefany Shaheen top fundraisers in City Council race
Firefighter unions endorse nine Portsmouth City Council candidates
description: The city’s two firefighter unions have come out in support of nine candidates running for City Council in next week’s municipal election.

title: Closing Argument
description: I am proud of the positive, solution-oriented, independent campaign I have run and ask you to vote for me on November 5.

title: Thank You
description: I would like to thank everyone who voted, congratulate the incoming City Council, and wish them the best going forward.
